points.name: Main NAM Files
points.description: The Network Addon Mod will introduce numerous network and traffic enhancements to the game.

points.name: Documentation
points.description: This will install the documentation for the Network Addon Mod.

points.name: Run Cleanitol and the Station Updater
points.description:
Run the Cleanitol program, which removes all plugins incompatible with the NAM from your system.
This is automatically done at a NAM upgrade, and usually doesn't have to be done otherwise.

points.name: Traffic Driving Side (Usually shouldn't be changed)
points.description: The traffic driving side is usually set automatically, but can be changed here if necessary.

child.name: Game traffic drives on right side of road
child.description: Choose this option only if your traffic drives on the right side of the road in the game.

child.name: Game traffic drives on left side of road
child.description: Choose this option only if your traffic drives on the left side of the road in the game.

points.name: Traffic Simulator and Related Options
points.description: Includes options for the NAM Traffic Simulator, the Automata Controller, and the new Zones Data View.

child.name: Select Traffic Simulator and Capacity Levels
child.description:
Choose one of the Traffic Simulators here.
Custom Traffic Simulators can be created with the Traffic Simulator Configuration Tool, which is optionally installed at the end of the main NAM installation.

child.name: NAM Traffic Simulator Classic
child.description: Uses the standard Maxis capacities; useful for rural areas and towns.

child.name: NAM Traffic Simulator Low
child.description: Increases capacities a little; useful for small to medium-sized cities.

child.name: NAM Traffic Simulator Medium
child.description: Increases capacities a bit more; useful for medium to large-sized cities.

child.name: NAM Traffic Simulator High
child.description: Increases capacities considerably; useful for large cities, or very large cities with little mass transit.

child.name: NAM Traffic Simulator Ultra
child.description: Increases capacities a lot; useful for very large cities, especially with much regional traffic.

child.name: Keep my previous traffic simulator
child.description: Retains the traffic simulator that is currently installed.

child.name: Build a custom traffic simulator
child.description: Allows you to build a custom traffic simulator at the end of this installation.

child.name: New Zones Data View
child.description:
Choose this option to add all networks and props to the standard Zones Data View.
The exact composition of this view can be refined by using the Traffic Simulator Configuration Tool.
